reviewText: not what I had hoped...like a high-school paper- not a great product- only watched it once & didn't finish it.  I read everything he ever wrote- this was a great disappointment...rgj

I've always been a fan of Bucky and learned of him at an early age since I happened to grow up in a geodesic dome house, one of his many creations. I was so touched while watching this thought provocking and educational film. I was delighted to feel as though I was taking a leisurely stroll through this inventors mind. Bucky is brought back to life by Brad Armstrong's bewitching performance. I strongly recommend this for anyone from a die hard fan of Bucky to those interested in diving into the mind of futuristic genius.
